summary: CHECK AIRBAG LIGHT ILLUMINED WHEN DRIVING. HORN, CRUISE CONTROL AND RADIO CONTROL ON STEERING WHEEL DO NOT WORK. MECHANIC IDENTIFIED DEFECTIVE CLOCK SPRING ASSY. SAID IT WAS A RECALL ITEM. DEALER SAID RECALL ONLY APPLIED TO 1996-1998 MODEL YEARS, NOT MINE WHICH WAS 1999. SAME CLOCK SPRING ASSY AS RECALL.    *NLM
